p:
Using propane as a solvent, Zanqui et al. (
2 ) reported the yields higher than 48.7% ω-3 and 12.3% ω-6 from linseed oil. Results closer to those reported in this study were found by Ivanov et al. (
20 ), who obtained 53.7% ω-3, 16.17% ω-6 and 19.4% ω-9 from linseed oil extracted using CO 2, however, the used pressure ranged from 4.5 to 6.2·10 9 Pa, which may be explained by the extraction processing conditions and seed origin.
